unnormalised: Right now, we're still so reliant on fossil fuels, which contributes to pollution and climate change. Switching to renewable energy can significantly reduce our carbon footprint and improve air quality, especially in densely populated cities like Mumbai and Kolkata. Plus, it can create new jobs and boost our economy. Remember that saying, "Necessity is the mother of invention"? We need renewable energy *badly*.
